titleStmt.title: Miscellanies of divinitie divided into three books, wherein is explained at large the estate of the soul in her origination, separation, particular judgement, and conduct to eternall blisse or torment. By Edvvard Kellet Doctour in Divinitie, and one of the canons of the Cathedrall Church of Exon.
titleStmt.author: Kellett, Edward, 1583-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the printers to the Vniversitie of Cambridge, and are to be sold [in London] by Robert Allot, at the Beare in Pauls-Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: In three books; books 2 and 3 have caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the printers to the Vniversitie of Cambridge
